00014 #ifndef __MLPACK_METHODS_LMF_RANDOM_ACOL_INIT_HPP
00015 #define __MLPACK_METHODS_LMF_RANDOM_ACOL_INIT_HPP
00016 
00017 #include <mlpack/core.hpp>
00018 
00019 namespace mlpack {
00020 namespace amf {
00021 
00031 template<int p = 5>
00032 class RandomAcolInitialization
00033 {
00034  public:
00035   // Empty constructor required for the InitializeRule template
00036   RandomAcolInitialization()
00037   { }
00038 
00039   template<typename MatType>
00040   inline static void Initialize(const MatType& V,
00041                                 const size_t r,
00042                                 arma::mat& W,
00043                                 arma::mat& H)
00044   {
00045     const size_t n = V.n_rows;
00046     const size_t m = V.n_cols;
00047 
00048     if (p > m)
00049     {
00050       Log::Warn << "Number of random columns is more than the number of columns"
00051           << "available in the V matrix; weird results may ensue!" << std::endl;
00052     }
00053 
00054     W.zeros(n, r);
00055 
00056     // Initialize W matrix with random columns.
00057     for (size_t col = 0; col < r; col++)
00058     {
00059       for (size_t randCol = 0; randCol < p; randCol++)
00060       {
00061         // .col() does not work in this case, as of Armadillo 3.920.
00062         W.unsafe_col(col) += V.col(math::RandInt(0, m));
00063       }
00064     }
00065 
00066     // Now divide by p.
00067     W /= p;
00068 
00069     // Initialize H to random values.
00070     H.randu(r, m);
00071   }
00072 }; // Class RandomAcolInitialization
00073 
00074 }; // namespace amf
00075 }; // namespace mlpack
00076 
00077 #endif
